search:crossSearchType.search:name: Search for most recent LUs
search:crossSearchType.search:desc: LU Search that finds all current courses or most recent approved courses for non-active LUs

search:searchType.search:name: Search for resultComponents for a specific Clu
search:searchType.search:desc: Search for resultComponents for a specific Clu

search:searchType.search:name: Determine if the course version is versionable
search:searchType.search:desc: Determine if the course version is versionable

search:searchType.search:name: Proposal search by course codes
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all proposals that contain the course codes

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: Proposal search by course codes Criteria
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Proposal search by course codes Criteria

search:searchType.search:name: Dependency Analysis
search:searchType.search:desc: Search for Clus that are dependencies of the target Clu

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: Dependency Analysis Results
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: Full view of clus/clusets that are dependencies of the target Clu

search:resultColumn.search:name: Dependency Type
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Course Requirement, Program Requirement, or Clu Set

search:resultColumn.search:name: Dependency Type Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Course Requirement, Program Requirement, or Clu Set

search:resultColumn.search:name: Dependency Root Id
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Course Requirement, Program Requirement, or Clu Set

search:resultColumn.search:name: Dependency Requirement Component Ids
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Comma delimited list of requirement component ids

search:resultColumn.search:name: Dependency Requirement Oversight Committee Ids
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Comma delimited list of oversight committee ids

search:resultColumn.search:name: Dependency Requirement Oversight Committee Names
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Comma delimited list of oversight committee Names

search:resultColumn.search:name: Different Admin Orgs
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Flag if no oversight orgs in target clu are found in dependent clus

search:searchType.search:name: Basic and Advanced Search
search:searchType.search:desc: Query with multiple optional elements to satisfy most advanced pickers

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Effective Date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time the CLU became effective. This is a similar concept to the effective date on enumerated values. When an expiration date has been specified, this field must be less than or equal to the expiration date.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Effective Date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time the CLU became effective. This is a similar concept to the effective date on enumerated values. When an expiration date has been specified, this field must be less than or equal to the expiration date.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Short name for the lu, recorded as the default listing.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Long name for the lu, recorded as the default listing.

search:searchType.search:name: Lum Search for Clus in a Cluset
Basic and Advanced Search
search:searchType.search:desc: Query with multiple optional elements to satisfy most advanced pickers

search:searchType.search:name: Lum Search for Clus Ids and Codes
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all available Clus Ids and Codes

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: LU Quick View with LO ids
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: Quick view of the CLU with LO ids

search:searchType.search:name: Search for clu id by its code
Search for the CLU which is valid for a particular date

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: Search by course code and a date
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Search by course code and a date

search:searchType.search:name: Code and state match
search:searchType.search:desc: Search by CLU Code and State.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Clu Long Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Official identifier long name of a Clu

search:searchType.search:name: Basic and Advanced Search on Clu Sets
search:searchType.search:desc: Query with multiple optional elements to satisfy most advanced pickers

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: Clu Set Id, Name, Description and Type
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: Limited view of information in the set

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: Clu Set Advanced Criteria
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Advanced criteria for searching for clu sets

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Id
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a Clu Set.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Clu Set Name
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Name of a child Clu Set.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Reusable Clu Set
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Whether a Clu Set can be reused.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Referenceable Clu Set
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Whether a Clu Set can be referenced by ReqComponents and other entities.

search:searchType.search:name: Search for clu type optionally by code
Find all versions of a clu
search:searchType.search:desc: Query to find all versions of a Clu

search:crossSearchType.search:name: LU Search for Majors and Variations
search:crossSearchType.search:desc: Returns all matching Majors and Variations

search:resultColumn.search:name: Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Long name for the lu, recorded as the default listing.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Long name for the lu, recorded as the default listing.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Long name for the lu, recorded as the default listing.

search:searchType.search:name: Find clu's based on the admin org
search:searchType.search:desc: Intended for searches that need to find clu's associated with organizations

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: Full View of Clu plus admin org info
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: All information in the full view plus admin org id and type

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: Search by admin org and type
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Search by the admin or and the type of releationship the org has to the clu

search:resultColumn.search:name: Administrative Org Type
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Type of Relationship this Organization has Administratively to this clu

search:resultColumn.search:name: Clu CLu Relation Type
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Type of Relationship between two clus

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: Related Lu Types
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: List of the types associated with an LU

search:searchType.search:name: Search for Course Codes
search:searchType.search:desc: Search for all distinct Course Codes used by type aheads

entry.value: SELECT DISTINCT clu.officialIdentifier.code, officialIdentifier.shortName, officialIdentifier.longName, cludesc.plain, clu.id FROM Clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc
SELECT rel.relatedClu.id, rel.relatedClu.luType.id FROM CluCluRelation rel WHERE rel.clu.id = :lu_queryParam_cluId

SELECT clu.id, officialIdentifier.shortName, officialIdentifier.longName, officialIdentifier.code, officialIdentifier.level, cludesc.plain, clu.studySubjectArea, clu.state, clu.expectedFirstAtp, clu.lastAtp, clu.version.versionedFromId, clu.version.currentVersionStart, clu.version.currentVersionEnd, clu.version.sequenceNumber, clu.expectedFirstAtp, clu.lastAtp FROM Clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc WHERE clu.version.versionIndId = :lu_queryParam_cluVersionIndId
SELECT clu.id, clu.officialIdentifier.longName, clu.version.versionIndId FROM Clu clu WHERE LOWER(clu.state) NOT IN ('Draft') ORDER BY clu.officialIdentifier.longName
SELECT clu.id FROM Clu clu WHERE clu.officialIdentifier.code = :lu_criteria_code ORDER BY clu.effectiveDate DESC

SELECT clu.id FROM Clu clu WHERE clu.officialIdentifier.code = :lu_queryParam_code AND clu.effectiveDate <= :lu_queryParam_someDate AND (clu.expirationDate >= :lu_queryParam_someDate OR clu.expirationDate IS NULL)
SELECT clu.id, clu.officialIdentifier.longName, clu.officialIdentifier.code, clu.version.versionIndId FROM CluSet cluset JOIN cluset.clus clu

SELECT clu.id, clu.officialIdentifier.code, clu.version.versionIndId FROM Clu clu WHERE clu.officialIdentifier.code like :lu_queryParam_startsWith_cluCode || '%' and clu.state = :lu_queryParam_cluState ORDER BY clu.officialIdentifier.code ASC

SELECT clu.id, officialIdentifier.shortName, officialIdentifier.longName, officialIdentifier.code, officialIdentifier.level, cludesc.plain, clu.studySubjectArea, clu.state, clu.version.versionIndId, clu.version.versionedFromId, clu.version.currentVersionStart, clu.version.currentVersionEnd FROM Clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier WHERE clu.version.sequenceNumber=( SELECT MAX(mostrecentclu.version.sequenceNumber) FROM Clu mostrecentclu LEFT JOIN mostrecentclu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier WHERE clu.version.versionIndId=mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId AND mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId IS NOT NULL AND mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId NOT IN ( SELECT activeclu.version.versionIndId FROM Clu activeclu WHERE activeclu.version.versionIndId=mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId AND activeclu.version.versionIndId=mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId AND (activeclu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_DATE AND (activeclu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_DATE OR activeclu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL)) ) GROUP BY mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId )

SELECT clu.id, officialIdentifier.shortName, officialIdentifier.longName, officialIdentifier.code, officialIdentifier.level, cludesc.plain, clu.studySubjectArea, clu.state, clu.version.versionIndId, clu.version.versionedFromId, clu.version.currentVersionStart, clu.version.currentVersionEnd FROM Clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc WHERE (clu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (clu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR clu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL) ) AND officialIdentifier.code is not null

SELECT clu.id, officialIdentifier.code, clu.version.versionIndId FROM Clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier WHERE clu.version.sequenceNumber=(SELECT MAX(mostrecentclu.version.sequenceNumber) FROM Clu mostrecentclu WHERE clu.version.versionIndId=mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId AND mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY mostrecentclu.version.versionIndId)

SELECT clu.id, officialIdentifier.shortName, officialIdentifier.longName, officialIdentifier.code, officialIdentifier.level, cludesc.plain, clu.studySubjectArea, clu.state, clu.version.versionIndId, clu.version.versionedFromId, clu.version.currentVersionStart, clu.version.currentVersionEnd FROM Clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc where officialIdentifier.code is not null

SELECT clu.id, officialIdentifier.shortName, officialIdentifier.longName, officialIdentifier.code, officialIdentifier.level, cludesc.plain, clu.studySubjectArea, clu.state, clu.version.versionIndId, clu.version.versionedFromId, clu.version.currentVersionStart, clu.version.currentVersionEnd, adminOrg.orgId, adminOrg.type FROM CluAdminOrg adminOrg LEFT JOIN adminOrg.clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.officialIdentifier officialIdentifier LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc

SELECT DISTINCT cluset.id, cluset.name, cluset.descr.plain, cluset.type FROM CluSet cluset LEFT JOIN cluset.cluVerIndIds cluVerIndId LEFT JOIN cluset.cluSets subcluset LEFT JOIN cluset.descr clusetDescr

SELECT DISTINCT cluset.id, cluset.name, cluset.descr.plain, cluset.type FROM Clu clu, CluSet cluset LEFT JOIN cluset.cluVerIndIds cluVerIndId LEFT JOIN cluset.cluSets subcluset LEFT JOIN cluset.descr clusetDescr WHERE clu.version.versionIndId = cluVerIndId.cluVersionIndId
SELECT rel.clu.id, rel.relatedClu.id FROM CluCluRelation rel

(clu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_DATE AND (clu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_DATE OR clu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL)
AND '1'=:lu_queryParam_luOptionalCurrentVersion)

LOWER(clu.officialIdentifier.code) LIKE '%' || LOWER(:cluset_queryParam_luOptionalCode) || '%' AND clu.version.versionIndId = cluVerIndId.cluVersionIndId AND (clu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (clu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR clu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL) )

LOWER(clu.officialIdentifier.longName) LIKE '%' || LOWER(:cluset_queryParam_luOptionalLongName) || '%' AND clu.version.versionIndId = cluVerIndId.cluVersionIndId AND (clu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (clu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR clu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL) )

clu.id =:cluset_queryParam_luOptionalId AND clu.version.versionIndId = cluVerIndId.cluVersionIndId AND (clu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (clu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR clu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL) )
SELECT DISTINCT clu.id, clu.luType.name, clu.state, clu.officialIdentifier.code, clu.version.versionIndId, rel.loId FROM CluLoRelation rel JOIN rel.clu clu LEFT JOIN clu.adminOrgs adminOrg
SELECT lut.id, lut.name, lut.descr, lut.effectiveDate, lut.expirationDate FROM LuType lut

clu.version.versionIndId = :lu_queryParam_luOptionalVersionIndId AND (clu.version.currentVersionStart <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (clu.version.currentVersionEnd > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR clu.version.currentVersionEnd IS NULL) )
SELECT pub.id, pub.name, pub.descr, pub.effectiveDate, pub.expirationDate FROM CluPublicationType pub

SELECT clu.id,' ', ident1.code, clu.state, clu.luType.id, ident1.longName, 'N/A', credident.shortName FROM Clu clu, CluIdentifier ident1, Clu credential, CluIdentifier credident, CluCluRelation relation WHERE clu.officialIdentifier.id = ident1.id AND clu.luType.id = 'kuali.lu.type.MajorDiscipline' AND clu.id = relation.relatedClu.id AND relation.clu.id = credential.id AND credential.officialIdentifier.id = credident.id AND relation.luLuRelationType.id = 'kuali.lu.lu.relation.type.hasMajorProgram'

SELECT clu2.id, clu.id, ident1.code, clu.state, clu.luType.id, ident2.longName, ident1.longName, credident.shortName FROM Clu clu, CluIdentifier ident1, Clu clu2, CluIdentifier ident2, CluCluRelation rel, Clu credential ,CluIdentifier credident , CluCluRelation rel2 WHERE clu.id = rel.relatedClu.id and rel.clu.id = clu2.id and clu.officialIdentifier.id = ident1.id and clu2.officialIdentifier.id = ident2.id AND rel.luLuRelationType.id = 'kuali.lu.lu.relation.type.hasVariationProgram' AND clu.luType.id = 'kuali.lu.type.Variation' AND clu2.id = rel2.relatedClu.id AND rel2.clu.id = credential.id AND credential.officialIdentifier.id = credident.id AND rel2.luLuRelationType.id = 'kuali.lu.lu.relation.type.hasMajorProgram'

SELECT clu.id, ident.shortName, ident.longName, ident.code, ident.level, cludesc.plain, clu.studySubjectArea, clu.state, clu.version.versionIndId, clu.version.versionedFromId, clu.version.currentVersionStart, clu.version.currentVersionEnd, rel.luLuRelationType.id FROM Clu clu, CluIdentifier ident, CluCluRelation rel LEFT JOIN clu.descr cludesc WHERE rel.clu.id = clu.id AND clu.officialIdentifier.id = ident.id

SELECT clu.id, ident.longName, clu.state, options.resultComponentId, org.orgId, '', campus.campusLocation, credentialIdent.level, rel.clu.id FROM CluIdentifier ident, CluResult result, IN(result.resultOptions) options, Clu clu, IN(clu.adminOrgs) org, IN(clu.campusLocations) campus, CluCluRelation rel, CluIdentifier credentialIdent WHERE clu.officialIdentifier.id = ident.id AND clu.luType.id = 'kuali.lu.type.MajorDiscipline' AND result.clu.id = clu.id AND result.cluResultType.id = 'kuali.resultType.degree' AND org.type = 'kuali.adminOrg.type.CurriculumOversightDivision' AND clu.state IN ('Active','Suspended','Retired') AND rel.relatedClu.id = clu.id AND rel.luLuRelationType.id = 'kuali.lu.lu.relation.type.hasMajorProgram' AND rel.clu.officialIdentifier.id = credentialIdent.id

SELECT rel.clu.id, rel.relatedClu.officialIdentifier.longName FROM CluCluRelation rel WHERE rel.luLuRelationType.id = 'kuali.lu.lu.relation.type.hasVariationProgram' AND rel.relatedClu.luType.id = 'kuali.lu.type.Variation' ORDER BY rel.relatedClu.officialIdentifier.longName ASC
SELECT COUNT(clu) FROM Clu clu WHERE clu.version.versionIndId = :lu_queryParam_versionIndId AND clu.version.sequenceNumber > :lu_queryParam_sequenceNumber
SELECT DISTINCT options.resultComponentId FROM CluResult result JOIN result.clu clu, IN(result.resultOptions) options
